mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(cash), 0) FROM balance WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT * FROM user_skins WHERE email = #{email} AND skin_idx = #{skinIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_skins (email, skin_idx, get_type, created_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{skinIdx}, #{getType}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: INSERT INTO balance (receipt_idx, email, point, cash) VALUES (seq_balance.NEXTVAL, #{email}, 0, -#{amount})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO receipt (receipt_idx, email, cash_type, io_type, pay_at) VALUES (seq_receipt.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{cashType}, #{ioType}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
